const response = await client.watcher.putWatch({
  id: "log_error_watch",
  trigger: {
    schedule: {
      interval: "10s",
    },
  },
  input: {
    search: {
      request: {
        indices: ["logs"],
        body: {
          query: {
            match: {
              message: "error",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
----
